Article Title: Ja’Marr Chase could face suspension after spitting on Jalen Ramsey in Bengals vs Steelers match
Article Text:
Ja’Marr Chase could miss Week 12 after spitting incident (Image via: Getty Images)

Ja’Marr Chase suspension could sideline star receiver for Week 12 Bengals vs Patriots game



More coverage in NFL:

The Bengals-Steelers clash on Sunday left the NFL world talking, not just about the score but about a heated on-field altercation. Steelers cornerback Jalen Ramsey was ejected for punching Bengals star Ja’Marr Chase, but footage suggests Chase may have provoked the fight by spitting on Ramsey. The incident now puts Chase’s availability for Week 12 in serious jeopardy.Cincinnati could be without its top receiver in a crucial matchup against the New England Patriots. Losing Chase would be a massive blow to the Bengals’ offense, forcing quarterback Joe Burrow and the coaching staff to adjust their game plan. The NFL has clear precedent for punishing spitting incidents, making a suspension a real possibility.The NFL is reviewing the incident, with a ruling expected soon. Ramsey claimed Chase provoked him by spitting, though officials did not see the act during the game. Replay footage, however, appears to support Ramsey’s account. Previously, Philadelphia Eagles defensive tackle Jalen Carter was ejected for spitting, and the league treated that as a one-game suspension equivalent. Experts like Mike Florio note that when spitting is missed by officials during a game, a suspension without pay for the next game typically follows.On Sunday, only Ramsey’s retaliatory punch was seen by officials, leaving the NFL to impose potential discipline after the fact. Even if Chase’s act had been caught, the timing late in the game would have made an in-game ejection insufficient. A suspension would mean the Bengals face the Patriots without their top receiving threat, complicating game plans and potentially affecting playoff positioning.Chase has denied the allegations, stating, “I didn't spit on nobody,” while referee Bill Vinovich confirmed his crew did not witness the alleged act. Still, video evidence and Ramsey’s statements make a strong case for league discipline. The NFL’s decision could have major implications for the Bengals’ offensive strategy in Week 12 and influence the team’s positioning in the AFC playoff race. A suspension for Chase would leave Cincinnati without its top receiving threat, forcing adjustments to Joe Burrow’s game plan. The ruling could also set a precedent for how the league handles similar incidents in the future.
Article Summary: Ja’marr chase could miss week 12 after spitting incident. Steelers cornerback jalen ramsey was ejected for punching bengals star. Chase may have provoked the fight by spitting on ramsey, according to replay footage. Nfl has clear precedent for punishing spitting incidents, making a suspension a real possibility.

Article Title: “We all want to meet her”: Steelers WAGs grow frustrated as Aaron Rodgers’ secretive wife remains a complete mystery
Article Text:
Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers has sparked curiosity beyond the football field. His wife, Brittani, remains an enigma, with even teammates admitting they have not met her. Rodgers revealed his marriage months ago but offered no details. While Rodgers leads the Steelers in a competitive season, the mystery surrounding his spouse continues to grow, captivating those close to the team.

Interest grows inside the Steelers community as WAGs admit they still haven’t met Aaron Rodgers’ wife

More coverage on NFL:

Aaron Rodgers has brought plenty of intrigue to Pittsburgh this season, and surprisingly, not all of it has to do with football. As the 41-year-old quarterback leads the Steelers through a competitive AFC North race, fans and teammates alike have been buzzing about something completely unrelated to passing yards or touchdowns, the identity of his elusive wife, Brittani.Rodgers stunned the NFL world earlier this year when he casually revealed he got married “a couple months ago,” yet offered no details about the ceremony or his spouse. Months into the season, the mystery remains unsolved, turning Brittani into one of the most talked-about topics around the Steelers’ facility.Rodgers’ performance this season has been strong, with 1,853 passing yards and 18 touchdowns, helping the Steelers sit atop the AFC North with a 5-4 record. But while fans are focused on his comeback and playoff push, those close to the team say an entirely different curiosity is dominating conversations behind the scenes.Rodgers was first spotted wearing a wedding band during his inaugural practice with the Steelers, confirming rumors that he’d tied the knot shortly before joining the team. Since then, however, his wife has remained completely absent from public view, no game appearances, no social media presence, no accidental sightings.According to one unidentified Steelers WAG who spoke to the Daily Mail, “She’s like a phantom. We all want to meet her, to invite her out, get to know her. But we haven’t met her yet. We don’t even know who she is.”Rodgers has long been one of the league’s most private and polarizing stars, so it isn’t shocking that he and Brittani are choosing to stay out of the spotlight. The quarterback is no stranger to intense media scrutiny, and protecting his relationship may be a deliberate attempt to keep a part of his life untouched by the chaos of NFL fame.Still, with Rodgers thriving on the field, curiosity around the couple continues to grow. And unless Rodgers decides to share more, Brittani’s identity may remain one of the NFL’s most persistent and fascinating mysteries, one that even the Steelers’ own WAGs can’t crack.
Article Summary: Steelers quarterback aaron rodgers has sparked curiosity beyond the football field. His wife, brittani, remains an enigma, with even teammates admitting they have not met her. Rodgers revealed his marriage months ago but offered no details about the ceremony or his spouse.

Article Title: NFL Thanksgiving halftime shows: Post Malone and Jack White to headline on big holiday tradition games
Article Text:
Post Malone and Jack White will be performing 2025 NFL Thanksgiving halftime shows (Getty Images)

NFL Thanksgiving halftime shows 2025



More NFL coverage

The Thanksgiving schedule is set to feel bigger this year as three music stars step into the spotlight for the NFL halftime shows. Each game already draws a huge audience, but this year’s performers give fans even more reason to tune in. Jack White Post Malone and Lil Jon will lead the entertainment lineup, turning the holiday tradition into a full day of football and high energy concerts. The league confirmed their appearances along with the matchups that will shape the day.The Detroit Lions start the action at home against the Green Bay Packers. Dallas follows with its afternoon clash against the Kansas City Chiefs. The night ends in Baltimore when the Ravens host the Cincinnati Bengals. With that, viewers get three games and three headliners, giving the holiday a larger stage feel from noon to night.Detroit native Jack White begins the celebration when he performs during the Lions and Packers game at Ford Field. White is a 12 time Grammy winner and gained early fame with the White Stripes. He formed the group with Meg White in 1997 and stayed with it until 2011. Their album “Elephant” earned them their first two Grammys in 2004. White later built a strong solo career and released six studio albums. Rolling Stone has included him on its lists of the greatest guitarists of all time, and he entered the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame this month as a member of the White Stripes.Eminem and Paul Rosenberg are the executive producers of this halftime show, bringing even more Detroit flavor to the event.Post Malone takes over in Dallas when the Cowboys meet the Chiefs. The Texas raised star has earned chart success in pop, hip hop, R&B and country. He holds the record for the most Grammy nominations without a win at 18. His early hit “White Iverson” in 2015 led to his deal with Republic Records, and “Congratulations” became his first Diamond certified song. His track “Sunflower” from the 2018 Spider Man movie once held the record as the highest certified song in RIAA history. Malone said, “I'm from Texas. I grew up a Cowboys fan and have been watching this halftime show for years. It's a real honor to be part of the Red Kettle Kickoff with The Salvation Army and the Dallas Cowboys and help bring hope to so many people.”Lil Jon closes the day in Baltimore during the Ravens and Bengals game. The Atlanta born artist won his first Grammy for his feature on Usher’s hit “YEAH!” and reached No. 4 on the Hot 100 with “Turn Down for What.” He previously appeared during the Super Bowl LVIII halftime show and now returns to an NFL stage for Thanksgiving night.
Article Summary: Post malone and jack white will be performing 2025 nfl thanksgiving halftime shows. Detroit lions start the action at home against the green bay packers. Dallas follows with its afternoon clash against the kansas city chiefs. The night ends in baltimore when the ravens host the cincinnati bengals.

Article Title: What happened to Victor Wembanyama? San Antonio Spurs face massive blow as their cornerstone is sidelined
Article Text:
Victor Wembanyama. Image via: Getty Images

Is Victor Wembanyama alright?



What Victor Wembanyama’s absence from the court means for the San Antonio Spurs



The San Antonio Spurs were riding one of their strongest starts in recent memory, fueled by Victor Wembanyama’s explosive third-year leap. That momentum came to a sudden halt after the team confirmed the 21-year-old star had suffered a left calf strain, an injury that will keep him out for at least a few weeks.It’s a setback that hits the franchise at a time when Wembanyama was not only anchoring their surge up the standings but emerging as an early MVP contender. With San Antonio sitting comfortably in the upper tier of the Western Conference, his absence forces the team to recalibrate both expectations and rotations.The injury occurred during Friday’s matchup against Golden State, a game Wembanyama finished with 26 points and 12 rebounds despite discomfort. He was ruled out ahead of Sunday’s win over Sacramento, and further testing confirmed the team’s fears. For a player who has already dealt with significant setbacks in his young career, including last season’s lengthy layoff, this latest development places added pressure on a Spurs roster that leans heavily on his two-way production.The Spurs insist they are taking a cautious path, and early indications suggest the injury isn’t season-threatening.“Obviously, we’ve seen around this league recently, the calf-tightness thing is not something you want to take lightly,” Spurs coach Mitch Johnson said.“Don’t want to push it there.” Wembanyama underwent an MRI over the weekend, with the team revealing the left calf strain on Monday. ESPN reported he will be reevaluated in two to three weeks.Wembanyama’s numbers before the injury underline why the organization is proceeding carefully. He has averaged just over 26 points, nearly 13 rebounds, and a league-leading block rate while playing 35 minutes per game.Replacing Wembanyama’s impact on both ends is nearly impossible. Without him, the Spurs lose their focal point on offense and their most imposing defensive presence. Luke Kornet stepped in as the starting center Sunday and delivered a solid outing, while Kelly Olynyk is expected to absorb expanded minutes. Still, neither replicates the spacing, rim protection, or versatility Wembanyama provides.San Antonio must also monitor the ripple effects. The team is already dealing with a hip injury to Stephon Castle, further thinning the rotation. De’Aaron Fox and the bench unit will shoulder greater scoring and creation duties as the Spurs try to maintain their early-season pace.Also Read: Draymond Green confronts taunting fan after Angel Reese jeers push tensions to a boiling point
Article Summary: Victor wembanyama has been ruled out for at least a few weeks with a left calf strain. The injury occurred during friday’s matchup against golden state. The spurs insist they are taking a cautious path, and early indications suggest the injury isn’t season-threatening.

Article Title: Auston Matthews' return is in doubt as Leafs' coach reveals discouraging signs about lingering lower-body injury
Article Text:
Auston Matthews injury update (Getty Images)

Toronto Maple Leafs head coach Craig Berube hints Matthews may be behind schedule



More NHL coverage

Toronto Maple Leafs fans hoped this stretch of the season would bring clarity, but Craig Berube’s latest update has only raised more questions. The coach revealed that Auston Matthews may be further behind in his recovery than anyone expected. His comments have shifted the mood in Toronto, especially with the team already battling uneven form and a crowded injured list. The Leafs had counted on a quick turnaround for their superstar. Instead, the timeline looks blurry and the concern is growing by the day.Matthews has been sidelined since suffering a lower-body injury in the November 11 meeting with the Boston Bruins. Berube initially estimated that the forward would miss about a week, and the team placed him on injured reserve shortly after. That move meant Matthews could return by November 18 against the St. Louis Blues, but that target now appears doubtful. TSN’s Mark Masters reported that Berube told media on November 17 that Matthews has not even touched the ice since exiting the Bruins game. The coach did say a return against the Blues was still possible, but the tone surrounding the update has left fans uneasy.The forward’s injury history adds weight to this concern. He already missed significant time earlier in the 2024-25 season with an upper-body issue, continuing a trend that has limited him throughout his career.Matthews has played at least 75 regular-season games just once since his rookie year in 2016-17. With Toronto sliding near the bottom of the Atlantic Division after 19 games, Masters’ report triggered strong reactions online. Some fans even responded by saying the team should “throw in the towel” on the season, a stark shift from the preseason optimism that came with top-ten Stanley Cup odds.Complicating matters, Matthews is only one of several key players on injured reserve. Chris Tanev, Brandon Carlo, Anthony Stolarz, and Scott Laughton are all sidelined, and Nicolas Roy is set to miss the matchup against St. Louis as well. That leaves the Leafs relying on a thin center group of John Tavares, Max Domi, Jacob Quillan, and Steven Lorentz. Quillan has just one NHL game, while Lorentz had 19 points in 80 games last season.Even so, the Leafs cannot pin everything on injuries. The roster lacks depth, and the front office is weighing roster-for-roster trades rather than dealing prospects. Elliotte Friedman recently said the team is open to offers for nearly every player except William Nylander, Matthew Knies, Matthews, and Tavares. How the team navigates this stretch may define the rest of their season.
Article Summary: Auston matthews has not played since suffering a lower-body injury on november 11. Toronto maple leafs coach craig berube said matthews may be further behind than expected. The team had hoped that matthews would return by november 18 against the st. louis blues.

Article Title: Houston Astros hit with Jose Altuve health news ahead of spring training
Article Text:
Jose Altuve. Image via: Tim Warner/Getty Images

Jose Altuve’s foot procedure adds an offseason wrinkle for the Astros



How Jose Altuve’s health shapes Houston’s roster outlook



The Houston Astros entered the offseason with the sting of missing the 2025 MLB playoffs still fresh. Their postseason streak had stretched across eight straight years, producing two championships and cementing the franchise as one of baseball’s modern powerhouses. That run ended this fall, leaving the club facing pointed questions about whether the window that once seemed wide open is starting to narrow. At the center of that discussion is Jose Altuve, the longest-tenured Astro and the face of the team’s recent dominance.Altuve completed his 15th season in Houston showing the kind of durability and competitiveness that has defined his career. He appeared in 155 games at age 35 and remained a productive bat, even as his numbers reflected a player pushing through discomfort. Now, as the Astros begin shaping their plans for 2026, the team is processing new health news surrounding their cornerstone second baseman.Early in the offseason, word emerged that Jose Altuve underwent a minor procedure on his right foot. According to Brian McTaggart of MLB.com, “Astros second baseman Jose Altuve, who was bothered by a sore right foot in the final two weeks of the regular season, underwent a minor skin aspiration Monday, a source told MLB.com.“He will be ready for the start of Spring Training.” McTaggart added, “Altuve had a procedure to remove fluid from a wound between his fourth and fifth toes on his right foot, the source said.”The injury dates back to September 13 against Atlanta, when Altuve was pulled from a game with discomfort and remained out the following night. Still, he played through the issue as Houston fought to stay alive in the playoff race.Once the Astros were eliminated, he finally sat. Even then, his competitive edge showed in flashes. Over his final 22 plate appearances, he posted a .353 average and a .500 on-base percentage, a reminder of the offensive spark he can still provide.Altuve’s surgery is not expected to delay his spring training readiness, but it arrives at a complicated moment for Houston. His overall production dipped in 2025, as he hit .265 with the lowest full-season on-base percentage he has posted in more than a decade. The Astros have also wrestled with how to manage his defensive role. They experimented with him in left field, hoping the short porch could mask range limitations, but manager Joe Espada ultimately returned him to second base.The challenge is that Houston lacks a clear internal replacement. Brice Matthews flashed promise but struck out at a high rate. Mauricio Dubón offers defense but not consistent offense, and his projected salary complicates the evaluation. Ramón Urías, meanwhile, struggled after the trade deadline. Those realities leave Altuve as the primary option for now, though the team remains linked to external possibilities such as Brendan Donovan or Brandon Lowe.Also Read: Javier Báez's wife Irmarie posts a touching tribute to her late mother, receiving warm reactions from MLB partners
Article Summary: Houston astros second baseman jose altuve underwent a minor procedure on his right foot. Altuve was bothered by a sore right foot in the final two weeks of the regular season. He will be ready for the start of spring training, a source told mlb.com.

Article Title: Travis Kelce’s coldest line after Chiefs loss leaves Kansas City shaken to the core: Are Patrick and co. spiraling out of control?
Article Text: Travis Kelce walked past reporters after the Chiefs’ loss and said “I could care less” about his record, revealing how tense things are in Kansas City. Patrick Mahomes owned the late-game collapse, and the Chiefs’ 5-5 start raises real questions about their AFC standing as they enter a must-win stretch.
Article Summary: Travis kelce walked past reporters after the chiefs’ loss and said “i could care less” about his record. Patrick mahomes owned the late-game collapse, and the chiefs' 5-5 start raises real questions about their afc standing.

Article Title: Trey Benson injury update: Cardinals' coach weighs in on his recovery as the team experiences a losing streak
Article Text:
Trey Benson sustained a brutal knee injury.(Image via Getty Images)

Trey Benson’s return timeline remains unclear as he continues to focus on his recovery



More coverage on the NFL -



Trey Benson, the 23 year old Arizona Cardinals’ running back, replaced James Conner on the field after Conner sustained a season ending injury.While this had sparked hope among fans, Trey Benson unfortunately sustained a brutal knee injury at the match against the Seattle Seahawks, which the Arizona Cardinals ultimately lost. As the Arizona Cardinals struggle on the field, here is the latest injury update about Trey Benson.As the Arizona Cardinals gear up to face the Jacksonville Jaguars in Week 12 after losing brutally to the San Francisco 49ers, there are no confirmed reports on when Trey Benson will be returning to the field.As per reports, after Trey Benson sustained his brutal knee injury in Week 5, he was immediately placed on injured reserve and was expected to return to the field in Week 10.However, it has not happened yet and this has sparked concern among fans.A few days ago, the Arizona Cardinals’ head coach, Jonathan Gannon, opened up about Trey Benson’s recovery.The Arizona Cardinals’ head coach, Jonathan Gannon, said, “He’s doing well…”Jonathan Gannon added, “Take it day by day there. He’s not gonna be out there today but he is doing better. What does close mean? I don’t know what close means. Take it day by day but he's doing well.He's progressing."As Trey Benson missed the game against the San Francisco 49ers over the weekend, this has become his sixth match that he has ended up missing due to his injury.At this point in time, the Arizona Cardinals’ star player, Trey Benson, has remained silent about his brutal injury as he continues to focus on his recovery.The Arizona Cardinals are experiencing a pretty challenging time in the new season. The team has managed to win just three out of the ten matches played so far.While the Arizona Cardinals did win the first two consecutive matches of the new season, against the New Orleans Saints and the Carolina Panthers, it has since experienced a losing streak apart from winning against the Dallas Cowboys.This has sparked panic among fans as many await Trey Benson’s return to the field in Week 12, even though the team has not confirmed anything yet.
Article Summary: Trey benson, the arizona cardinals’ running back, sustained a brutal knee injury in week 5 against the seattle seahawks. He replaced james conner on the field after conner sustained a season ending injury. There are no confirmed reports on when trey benson will be returning to the field.

Article Title: NHL trade update: How the LA Kings managed to sign Adrian Kempe within $11 million
Article Text:
Adrian Kempe signed an eight-year, $85 million contract with the Los Angeles Kings (Image via Getty Images)

How the Los Angeles Kings signed Adrian Kempe for within $11 million

Also read:

Adrian Kempe signed an eight-year, $85 million contract with the Los Angeles Kings on Monday. The LA Kings have signed the player to an agreement with an average annual value of $10.625 million. As per the NHL , the 29-year-old forward, who is in the last year of a four-year, $22 million contract ($5.5 million AAV) he signed with the Kings earlier on July 10, 2022, could have become an unrestricted free agent after this season. However, without letting this precious player trade to another team, the LA Kings managed to keep Kempe within $11 million.Kempe has been a key offensive catalyst for the Kings in recent seasons. He has led the team in scoring for the past two seasons and is off to a strong start this year with 19 points in 19 games. In addition to this, he scored an NHL career-high 41 goals in 2022-23 and had a career-high 75 points (28 goals, 47 assists) in 2023-24 before getting 73 points (35 goals, 38 assists) in 81 games last season.In a major move for the franchise’s future, the Los Angeles Kings have agreed to an eight-year contract extension with forward Adrian Kempe, locking him in for the upcoming NHL season. According to multiple sources, the deal is worth $85 million, signing Kempe to an average annual value (AAV) of $10.625 million, comfortably under the $11 million. But, how did they do?The first thing was the structure of the contract. The LA Kings crafted an agreement that suited Adrian Kempe while keeping the salary intact. The second was Kempe’s own preference to remain in Los Angeles, as he believes in the team, and reports suggested that he was willing to take slightly less to ensure a long-term fit.In the end, Kempe opted for familiarity and stability, even though he likely could have earned more if dealt with any other NHL team.Speaking about his contract signing, Los Angeles general manager Ken Holland said, “We are thrilled to have Adrian signed for the next eight seasons. He is an elite competitor who’s developed into one of the League's most dynamic two-way forwards, and his growth since joining the Kings organization has been tremendous. Adrian's presence both as a player and a leader is incredibly valuable to the team.”The manager further stated about how they signed him comfortably with that signing amount, "Throughout this process, both sides were committed to finding a structure that reflects Adrian’s importance to us while keeping our long-term goals of building a team capable of contending every season in mind. We’re excited to have Adrian remain a core part of our organization for years to come.”It is to be noted that he has 29 points (15 goals, 14 assists) in 28 Stanley Cup Playoff games, including 10 points (four goals, six assists) in six games last season when Los Angeles lost to the Edmonton Oilers in the Western Conference First Round.Moreover, Kempe will also play in Sweden's preliminary roster for the Olympic Winter Games Milano Cortina 2026 after playing for his country at the 4 Nations Face-Off last season.
Article Summary: Adrian kempe signed an eight-year, $85 million contract with the los angeles kings. The la kings have signed the player to an agreement with an average annual value of $10.625 million. Kempe has been a key offensive catalyst for the kings in recent seasons. He has led the team in scoring for the past two seasons.

Article Title: Who is Ella Hakkinen? All about the 14-year-old tipped to follow her father into F1 with McLaren
Article Text:
Ella Hakkinen (Image Source: Getty)

Ella Hakkinen’s karting pedigree and rise through the ranks

What McLaren’s backing means and the road ahead for Ella

A 14-year-old prodigy: Ella Hakkinen has recently been anointed with the coveted driver development programme at the McLaren F1 Team. In addition to the significance for her own career, Ella’s arrival also marks a key step forward in McLaren's ongoing push to support female drivers. With backing from the same team that nurtured her karting star, the daughter of two-time F1 world champion Mika Hakkinen looks set for a rapid promotion to the single-seater ranks.Her recruitment represents an expansion of McLaren's female-driver pipeline in which she joins two other young female talents and will ultimately become the youngest driver by far in that scheme. Ella joins as the team prepares to guide her through single-seater racing by 2027, setting the foundations for a possible future entry into Formula 1.Ella Hakkinen has taken her first steps in European karting, claiming victories and podiums in junior competitions. She won the Champions of the Future Academy event at Cremona in 2024. Her father has described her as “a very gifted racing driver.” Her name and play on words are now starting to attract attention, not just from her father, but from the speed at which he is progressing. By bringing her into McLaren's programme she is plugged into a formal development system aimed at helping her transition to singles-seaters later in the decade.Also Read: This is what Audi’s F1 car would look like! Debut & more details explained The addition of Ella Hakkinen is part of a wider McLaren initiative to improve female representation in motorsport. Team CEO Zak Brown emphasised that while there remains much to be done, the progress made so far is something the organisation is proud of. For Ella the next step is clear: testing single-seater cars in preparation for a debut around 2027. At just 14 the focus for now is development, experience and support rather than immediate entry into Formula 1.Nonetheless with her father’s endorsement, McLaren’s infrastructure behind her, and a promising karting track record, Ella Hakkinen sits among the most closely watched junior talents in motorsport today.
Article Summary: Ella hakkinen is the daughter of two-time f1 world champion mika. The 14-year-old has been anointed with the coveted driver development programme at the mclaren f1 team. Ella joins as the team prepares to guide her through single-seater racing by 2027.

Article Title: Dallas Cowboys remember late defensive end Marshawn Kneeland with tributes and helmet decals following his tragic death
Article Text:
Dallas Cowboys unite to honor teammate Marshawn Kneeland after his sudden death.

Dallas Cowboys honor late Marshawn Kneeland in multiple ways

More NFL coverage

The Dallas Cowboys are facing a heartbreak that no team should ever have to endure. Defensive end Marshawn Kneeland passed away during the team’s bye week, just days after celebrating his first NFL touchdown. Kneeland, a second-round draft pick from Western Michigan in 2024, had quickly become a key part of the Cowboys’ defense, especially after Micah Parsons was traded earlier this season. Known as much for his work ethic as his kind personality, Kneeland left a lasting impression on everyone around him, making his sudden death even harder to process.Since news of his passing broke, the Cowboys have been supporting one another through the grief. Coach Brian Schottenheimer spoke of the strength of the locker room and the bond his players share, telling reporters, "We’ve got an incredible locker room, that’s where the culture of what we’re trying to build. We are bonded more than any of us ever could have thought." The team is leaning on each other while honoring the memory of their late teammate.The team has put several tributes in place to honor Kneeland for the rest of the season.Players will wear helmet decals in his memory, with the design finalized by his teammates, according to ESPN and Todd Archer. In addition, the Cowboys will wear commemorative shirts before their November 17 game against the Las Vegas Raiders and their November 23 matchup with the Philadelphia Eagles, which will be the team’s first home game since Kneeland’s death. Fans at AT&T Stadium will also see a video tribute before the November 23 game. Kneeland was the first active NFL player to die since Vikings rookie Khyree Jackson in 2024. All Week 10 games observed a moment of silence in his honor before kickoff.Authorities confirmed that Kneeland died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound early on November 6. Police had tried to stop his car for a traffic violation, and after a brief pursuit, his body was found near a crash site. The Cowboys’ director of security had requested a welfare check at Kneeland’s home earlier that night. According to TMZ, Kneeland’s girlfriend told police that he had a history of mental health struggles and had threatened to "end it all," and dispatch audio revealed he had been "texting his family goodbye. "The NFL and NFL Players Association have provided counseling to help the Cowboys cope with the loss. As the team returns to the field, the players are focused on honoring Kneeland’s memory while coming together as a team.
Article Summary: Dallas cowboys unite to honor teammate marshawn kneeland after his sudden death. Cowboys will wear helmet decals in his memory, with the design finalized by his teammates. All week 10 games observed a moment of silence in his honor before kickoff. The team is leaning on each other while honoring the memory of their late teammate.

Article Title: Calgary Flames trade rumors: Rasmus Andersson, Nazem Kadri and Blake Coleman among potential deadline moves
Article Text:
Flames trade rumors featuring Rasmus Andersson, Nazem Kadri and Blake Coleman (Image via: Getty Images)

Calgary Flames trade rumors 2025: Key players that NHL teams are targeting



TSN’s Noodles On The State Of The Calgary Flames: Trades, Rebuild & Leadership | The Insider Hotline

More coverage on NHL:

The Calgary Flames are enduring a tough season as they remain near the bottom of the NHL standings. With inconsistent performance on the ice, the team is facing mounting pressure to make roster adjustments before the 2025 trade deadline. Trade speculation is intensifying as the Flames look to reshape their lineup and regain competitiveness in the league.While Flames GM Craig Conroy has yet to signal an active rebuild, calls from other NHL teams are reportedly coming in to gauge player availability. The stakes are high, as any major trade could reshape Calgary’s roster and influence their positioning for the 2026 season. Fans are particularly focused on veterans and core players who could attract attention from teams looking to bolster their lineups.Rasmus Andersson, the 29-year-old right-shot defenseman, has become a focal point in trade discussions. With unrestricted free agency looming next July, his contract status is unresolved, making him an attractive option for teams seeking a reliable blueliner. Analysts suggest any potential deal would likely require Andersson to agree to an extension, making negotiations complex but high-stakes. Andersson’s performance this season continues to keep him in trade conversations as the Flames navigate a challenging 2025 stretch.Nazem Kadri, a seasoned center under contract through 2028-29, also draws attention. His $7 million average annual value and no-trade list add layers of complexity, but teams looking for experienced depth at center are reportedly interested, especially with injuries impacting key players like Jack Hughes.Blake Coleman, a versatile left winger, has similarly appeared in trade conversations despite the Flames not actively seeking to move him. His $4.9 million AAV and multi-team trade approval make him a flexible option for teams evaluating deadline acquisitions. Should Calgary decide to engage in the market, Coleman’s combination of experience and adaptability could be a significant bargaining chip.For now, Conroy appears poised to wait for the right opportunity, likely leveraging the trade deadline to maximize returns on key assets. Flames fans can expect heightened speculation in the coming months, with any major moves potentially redefining the team’s trajectory in the NHL.
Article Summary: The calgary flames are enduring a tough season as they remain near the bottom of the nhl standings. The team is facing mounting pressure to make roster adjustments before the 2025 trade deadline. Trade speculation is intensifying as the flames look to reshape their lineup and regain competitiveness in the league.

Milwaukee Bucks vs Cleveland Cavaliers - Game Prediction

On Monday, the Milwaukee Bucks and Cleveland Cavaliers will play each other once again. After losing to the Cavaliers 118-113 in late October, Giannis Antetokounmpo and company are hoping to exact retribution in the rematch. The Bucks are also hoping to recover from Saturday's humiliating 119-95 loss to the Los Angeles Lakers.The Cavaliers will host the Milwaukee Bucks at Rocket Arena as they begin their homestand. They will now play the Milwaukee Bucks (8-6) at Rocket Arena on Monday at 7 p.m. ET. Two player to keep an eye on are Giannis Antetokounmpo of the Bucks and Evan Mobley of the Cavaliers.On Peacock, tipoff is scheduled for 7 p.m. Rocket Arena will host the event. Cleveland's creamsicle City Edition jerseys will be unveiled for the first time. Additionally, fans may watch the whole game on Fubo.Due in part to Donovan Mitchell's 5.4 assists per game, the Cavaliers have started 3-0 in division games and are currently ranked sixth in the East with an average of 27.6 assists per game. With an average of 26.8 assists per game, only Giannis Antetokounmpo's team-high 7.1 leads the Bucks, who are 2-1 in the division and eighth in the league.Giannis Antetokounmpo stated after the Milwaukee Bucks' defeat to the Lakers that they were unable to justify playing on the second night of a back-to-back game. The Bucks took a day off before travelling to Cleveland for the rematch with the Cavaliers, providing them with a break from the demanding schedule.This season, Antetokounmpo has averaged 32.6 points per game. Despite being guarded by the current Defensive Player of the Year, Evan Mobley, he sank forty points in the opening game against the Cavaliers. Antetokounmpo might maintain his MVP form and surpass his prop for 31.5 (O/U) points. Darius Garland ’s absence has had a major impact on the Cleveland Cavaliers. Donovan Mitchell said after an ugly win against the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday, their rhythm is not right now. Nevertheless, inspite of these difficualties, the teams are ready to face each other.Also read: Is Taurean Prince out of 2025-26 season? Milwaukee Bucks forward sidelined indefinitely as team awaits new plan
Article Summary: Milwaukee bucks and cleveland cavaliers will play each other once again. Tipoff is scheduled for 7 p.m. Et on monday at rocket arena. Bucks lost to cavaliers 118-113 in late october. Giannis antetokounmpo has averaged 32.6 points per game this season.

Article Title: Paige Greco's cause of death: Australian Paralympic gold medalist dies at 28 following unfortunate health issue
Article Text:
Paige Greco. Image via: SWpix.com

What is Paige Greco's cause of death ?



Paige Greco's sporting career at a glance



Australian para-cycling champion Paige Greco, one of the brightest talents in Paralympic sport, has died at 28. Authorities in South Australia confirmed she suffered a sudden medical episode at her home in Adelaide on Sunday. The news shook the sporting community, as Greco had only recently returned to elite racing after battling health issues last year. Her death comes at a moment when her career seemed to be entering a renewed chapter, making the loss feel even more abrupt.Greco’s family requested privacy as they process the tragedy, but shared their gratitude for the support pouring in from athletes, officials, and fans around the world. Tributes highlighted not only her achievements on the track but also the warmth and humility that endeared her to teammates and coaches. Her passing leaves a deep void in Australian para-sport, where she had become a symbol of perseverance and joy.According to South Australian authorities, Paige Greco experienced a sudden medical episode at her Adelaide home. No further medical details have been released, as the family has asked for time and privacy while mourning.Her mother, Natalie Greco, said her daughter “meant everything” to their family, adding, “Her kindness, her determination and her warmth touched our family every single day. She brought so much joy and pride into our lives, and the pain of her passing is something we will carry forever.”Natalie also expressed profound appreciation for the outpouring of support from Greco’s sporting community. “While we are devastated by her loss, we are incredibly proud of the person she was and the way she represented Australia,” she said.“As a family, we are deeply grateful for the support shown by so many people connected to Paige, including her teammates and friends. Paige cherished the connections she made through her sport, and we take comfort in knowing how widely she was loved. We are grieving deeply and ask for privacy, time and space to navigate this overwhelming loss.”AusCycling chief executive Marne Fechner described Greco as an “extraordinary athlete who achieved outstanding accomplishments at the highest levels of our sport,” adding that her “positive spirit and courageous outlook” left an imprint on everyone she met. Paralympics Australia CEO Cameron Murray echoed those sentiments, noting that her ability to uplift people was as impactful as her medal-winning performances.Greco, who lived with right-side hemiplegic cerebral palsy, began her athletic journey in track and field before shifting to cycling in 2018. Her rise was swift and commanding. At the Tokyo 2020 Paralympic Games, she delivered Australia’s first gold medal, setting a world record in the women’s C1–3 3,000m individual pursuit. She later added two bronze medals in the road race and time trial, solidifying her status as a global contender across disciplines.Beyond the Paralympics, Greco collected World Championship titles, World Cup medals, and continued competing at the highest level. She returned to international racing this year, earning another podium finish at the Para Track World Championships in Brazil. Coaches and teammates consistently praised her resilience, disciplined training, and the quiet determination that drove her success.Also Read: Paige Greco, Australia’s Paralympic gold medalist, dies at 28 leaving sporting community in grief
Article Summary: Australian para-cycling champion paige greco has died at 28. Authorities in south australia confirmed she suffered a sudden medical episode at her home in adelaide on sunday. The news shook the sporting community, as greco had only recently returned to elite racing after battling health issues last year.

Article Title: Blake Lizotte leads the way in Pittsburgh Penguins’ dominant 4-0 win over Nashville Predators
Article Text:
Blake Lizotte’s effort boosts Penguins’ momentum (Image via: Getty Images)

Blake Lizotte’s relentless play showcases why he’s becoming key piece for Pittsburgh



NHL Highlights | Penguins vs. Predators - November 16, 2025

More coverage on

NHL

:





Blake Lizotte delivered one of his most complete performances of the season as the Pittsburgh Penguins shut down the Nashville Predators in a commanding 4-0 victory. With the team searching for a spark after recent struggles, Lizotte stepped up in every zone, setting the tone with energy, discipline, and relentless pressure that Nashville simply couldn’t match.From the opening puck drop, Lizotte played with purpose. His speed disrupted breakouts, his tenacity on the forecheck created turnovers, and his defensive awareness helped neutralize Nashville’s limited scoring chances. Even before he sealed the game with an empty-net goal, his impact was clear that this was the kind of two-way effort that often goes unnoticed on the stat sheet but makes a massive difference in how a game unfolds.Lizotte was deployed on the fourth line once again, but his influence stretched far beyond typical fourth-line minutes. He dominated on the penalty kill, pressuring puck carriers, winning board battles, and refusing to give the Predators any clean looks. His commitment to the defensive side of the game played a major role in securing the shutout.The analytics matched what fans saw on the ice. Lizotte was on for 66.6% of the scoring chances and posted a strong 67.6% expected goals rate, elite numbers for any forward, especially one in a depth role.His work ethic helped stabilize the Penguins’ play and shift momentum at key moments.Injuries forced some lineup shuffling, including Connor Dewar moving up to skate alongside Sidney Crosby. Once healthy, Dewar is expected to return to the fourth line, where he and Lizotte form one of the most effective and irritating checking duos on the team. Their speed, pressure, and chemistry consistently wear down opponents and tilt the ice in Pittsburgh’s favor.Lizotte may have just three goals and four points through 19 games, but his value extends far beyond traditional scoring totals. His ability to drive possession, kill penalties, and outwork opponents makes him a crucial piece of the Penguins’ bottom six. Sunday’s win was a reminder that players like Lizotte often provide the spark needed to shift momentum, and he delivered exactly that in a much-needed victory.
Article Summary: Pittsburgh penguins defeated nashville predators 4-0 on sunday. Blake lizotte was deployed on the fourth line once again. His work ethic helped stabilize the penguins’ play and shift momentum at key moments. Lizotte has just three goals and four points through 19 games.

Article Title: Is Sam Reinhart playing against the Vancouver Canucks tonight? Latest update on Florida Panthers forward for November 17
Article Text:
Sam Reinhart expected to play for Panthers vs Canucks tonight (Image via: Getty Images)

Is Panthers’ Sam Reinhart playing tonight against the Vancouver Canucks?



Samson Reinhart: The smartest player in the NHL

More coverage on NHL:

The Florida Panthers are preparing for an important matchup, and all attention is on Sam Reinhart’s availability. The forward has shown flashes of scoring this season but has struggled with consistency, making his presence in the lineup a key factor as Florida faces the Vancouver Canucks for the first time this year. How Reinhart performs could influence Florida’s offensive strategy, especially in critical situations like power plays and close-score moments.Through 18 games, Reinhart has recorded 13 points, including two multi-point games. He has scored in nine contests, with one featuring multiple goals. On 51 shots, he has converted 10 into goals, giving him a 19.6% shooting rate. On the power play, he has scored three goals from 22 attempts, highlighting his ability to capitalize when the Panthers have a man advantage. These numbers suggest that while Reinhart’s consistency has been in question, his potential to impact the game remains significant.Yes, Sam Reinhart is expected to be in the Florida Panthers lineup for tonight’s game against the Vancouver Canucks. His offensive contribution, particularly on power plays and in key scoring areas, could be pivotal in helping Florida maintain pressure and create high-quality opportunities.Reinhart’s ability to find open lanes and position himself near the net makes him a constant threat, while his vision and timing can open space for teammates to capitalize. How Reinhart adapts to Vancouver’s defense will likely influence the Panthers’ overall performance in the matchup.Reinhart has shown the ability to score in clutch situations, and Florida will be relying on him to provide offensive sparks in critical moments. His shot accuracy and knack for being in the right place at the right time could help swing momentum in Florida’s favor. With power-play opportunities playing a key role in modern NHL games, Reinhart’s experience and scoring instincts will be essential for maximizing Florida’s chances to convert man-advantage situations into goals.The Florida Panthers will take on the Vancouver Canucks on Monday, November 17, 2025, at Amerant Bank Arena. Puck drop is scheduled for 7:00 PM ET, and the game will be broadcast on ESPN+. Reinhart’s expected presence makes him a player to watch, as his ability to convert scoring chances could play a decisive role in Florida’s offensive output. With this season opener against Vancouver, all eyes will be on Reinhart to see if he can turn his potential into points and give the Panthers an edge. His performance tonight could set the tone for his consistency moving forward in the season, and it may also impact Florida’s positioning in upcoming matchups.
Article Summary: Sam reinhart expected to play for panthers vs canucks tonight. Reinhart has recorded 13 points, including two multi-point games. On 51 shots, he has converted 10 into goals, giving him a 19.6% shooting rate. His performance tonight could set the tone for his consistency moving forward in the season.

Article Title: Why was Abdul Carter off the field vs. Packers early? Latest details from the Giants
Article Text:
Why was Abdul Carter benched in the Packers game? New details on the Giants rookie (Image Via Getty)

Abdul Carter was benched for missing a team walk-through at the Giants facility



Abdul Carter, the New York Giants rookie edge rusher, did not play during the first defensive series of the 27–20 loss to the Green Bay Packers on Sunday at MetLife Stadium in New Jersey. This was the first thing reporters noticed because the Giants started the game short on defense. Interim head coach Mike Kafka spoke after the game and said the decision was made by the coaching staff.But soon after the press conference, new information came out explaining why the rookie did not step on the field during that opening drive. The details came from people who were inside the Giants building before the game and saw what happened. The reason mattered even more because the Giants already had several injured players, including Kayvon Thibodeaux, who missed the game with a shoulder injury. That meant the team needed Abdul Carter on the field as soon as possible.According to Dan Duggan of The Athletic, Abdul Carter was benched because he missed the team walk-through on Saturday inside the Giants facility.Duggan reported that Abdul Carter was asleep at the facility when the walk-through took place and did not join the team on time.Duggan also wrote that Abdul Carter had been late to meetings before, and that this was a “trend” former head coach Brian Daboll allowed earlier in the season.When reporters asked Abdul Carter about the situation after the game on Sunday, he kept his answer short. He said, “I made a mistake, and there are consequences.” He did not give any more details about missing the walk-through or about the past late arrivals.Once the first defensive series ended, Abdul Carter played almost the whole game. He took every other defensive snap and finished with one tackle and one quarterback hit.Still, his rookie season has been slow compared to expectations. The Giants picked him No. 3 overall in the 2025 NFL Draft, hoping he would form a strong pass-rush trio with Brian Burns and Kayvon Thibodeaux.So far, Brian Burns has carried the group with 13 sacks this season. Abdul Carter has 0.5 sacks, and Kayvon Thibodeaux has 2.5 sacks. With Thibodeaux out because of his injury on Sunday, Abdul Carter’s workload grew right after the benching.These updates show why Abdul Carter sat out the first series and how the Giants handled the situation inside the locker room.More coverage on the NFL-
Article Summary: Abdul carter, the new york giants rookie edge rusher, did not play during the first defensive series of the 27–20 loss to the green bay packers on sunday. He was benched for missing a team walk-through at the giants facility on saturday. Abdul carter played almost the whole game and finished with one tackle and one quarterback hit.

Article Title: “I'm the best in the world” - Luke Littler becomes the youngest world no. 1 after Grand Slam of Darts triumph over Luke Humphries
Article Text:
Luke Littler (via Getty Images)

Luke Littler dominates rival Luke Humphries to secure No. 1 Spot in PDC world rankings



Luke Littler created darts history once again as he became the youngest-ever world number one after a stunning run at the Grand Slam of Darts in Wolverhampton. The 18-year-old English sensation defeated the defending world number one, Luke Humphries, by 16-11 in the final to lift the title for the second straight year. His dominant 16-9 semi-final victory over Danny Noppert had already guaranteed his rise to the top of the PDC world rankings. With this win, Littler also remained unbeaten in the Grand Slam and proved why he is the new face of the sport.This achievement adds to Littler’s rapidly growing legacy. He first shocked the world with his record-breaking run to the 2024 World Championship final. A year later, he became the youngest world champion, and since then, he has become a global star. After his Grand Slam victory, the teenager proudly declared, “I am the best in the world, I can finally say it.” Littler’s rise has been so quick that he overtook Michael van Gerwen’s record, who was 24 when he first reached world No. 1.Luke Littler’s victory over Luke Humphries was a statement. The match swung back and forth early, with Littler leading 2-0 before Humphries won four straight legs. Humphries stayed in front until a brilliant 167 checkout helped Littler level at 8-8.The turning point came at 10-9 when Humphries, in control of the leg, went for a risky 170 finish. He missed, and his follow-up visit also fell apart. Littler seized the chance with a perfect 160 checkout. From there, he powered forward and never let the lead slip.After the win, Littler said, “Now I’m number one, I’m hungry to stay there. I want to be there for the next few years.” He knows the pressure will grow, adding, “There’s going to be a target on my back from Luke and all the other players.”Humphries, who hit 16 180s in his semi-final win over Gerwyn Price, admitted it was an emotional night. “This is the last day as number one. I’ve been so happy and proud of myself,” he said. He added that his focus was now on winning trophies again, “When it gets to the Worlds, I’ve got one opportunity to take it back from him. I’ll be fighting hard; it’s a war now.”Littler’s achievement is remarkable. His prize money now totals £1.85 million in under two years, proving his rapid rise is no accident.Also Read: What is China’s new “Ultra-Perspective” mode in live streaming and why is it the ultimate game-changer for live sports?
Article Summary: Luke littler becomes youngest-ever world number one. The 18-year-old english sensation defeated luke humphries by 16-11 in the final. His dominant 16-9 semi-final victory over danny noppert had already guaranteed his rise to the top of the pdc world rankings.

Article Title: Zaccharie Risacher’s sudden departure sends Atlanta Hawks into a major chaos mode
Article Text:
Zaccharie Risacher (Image via Getty)

Atlanta Hawks' star Zaccharie Risacher takes a backseat after hip injury

Atlanta Hawks star Zaccharie Risacher is one of the most bankable athletes in the franchise. During a recent game against the Phoenix Suns, Risacher fell on his back while throwing down a slam dunk. The 20-year-old French athlete had to take a backseat after accidentally injuring his hip. The Atlanta Hawks have been rocked to the core after rising star Zaccharie Risacher made a shocking exit that no one saw coming. The move has sent shockwaves through the franchise.Zaccharie Risacher’s exit from the team saw disappointed faces in the stand too. The No. 1 overall pick in the 2024 NBA Draft, went on to secured 15 points on 6-of-13 alongwith four assists and three rebounds. After a close competition against the Phoenix Suns, the Atlanta Hawks led with an overall score of 124-122. Reportedly, there has been no update on his comeback as of now.The Atlanta Hawks witnessed one of the worst days of 2025-26 NBA regular season. Zaccharie Risacher, one the most talented stars of Hawks accidentally fell on his back while throwing a slam dunk against the Phoenix Suns. After securing 15 points under his belt, Risacher stole the ball and after a successful dunk, he fell on the ground, writhing in pain.He was taken to the locker room and shortly after that the Atlanta Hawks revealed that he would not be available for the rest of the game. According to ESPN’s senior NBA insider Shams Charania’s post on X,"Zaccharie Risacher (left hip contusion) will not return to tonight’s game."One of the most bankable faces in the Atlanta Hawks roster, Zaccharie Risacher’s exit has brought a big question looming in front of the NBA franchise. Reportedly, Risacher entered the game with 12.7 points along with 2.6 rebounds in the 2025-26 NBA regular season. He had even missed two games earlier in the NBA season after being down with an ankle injury in the opening games. The Hawks face the Pistons on Tuesday, with Risacher’s status still uncertain. The team has revealed little about his hip injury, leaving fans waiting for any update from the franchise. Reportedly, not much can be said about his availability for the upcoming game.Also Read: NBA roster update: Veteran guard finally joins Tyrese Haliburton’s team to bolster Indiana Pacers' depth
Article Summary: Atlanta hawks star zaccharie risacher is one of the most bankable athletes in the franchise. The 20-year-old fell on his back while throwing a slam dunk against the phoenix suns. He was taken to the locker room and shortly after that the atlanta hawks revealed that he would not be available for the rest of the game.
